column45: 02x08 - Performance Review;Dwight: Uh, duh.
column46: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jim: Duh.
column47: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jim: Today is Thursday. But Dwight thinks that it's Friday. And that's what I'll be working on this afternoon.
column48: 02x08 - Performance Review;Stanley: Sometimes women say more in their pauses than they say in their words.
column49: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Really?
column50: 02x08 - Performance Review;Stanley: Oh, yes. Let's listen to it again. And this time, really listen to the pauses.
column51: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: God, Stanley, that's frickin' brilliant. How do you know that? Did you learn that on the streets? Sorry.
column52: 02x08 - Performance Review;Stanley: Oh, no, that's ok. I did learn it on the streets. On the ghetto, in fact.
column53: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: No kidding.
column54: 02x08 - Performance Review;Stanley: It's all about my bonus.

column56: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jim: Ohh...
column57: 02x08 - Performance Review;Pam: Maybe more.
column58: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jim: Eck!... Oh! Also, it is Thursday, but Dwight thinks it's Friday. So, keep that goin'.
column59: 02x08 - Performance Review;Pam: Oh, yea!
column60: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Good work, Stanley. Great performance review. Stanley in the house, everybody. Woo! Angela, your turn.
column61: 02x08 - Performance Review;Angela: I actually look forward to performance reviews. I did the youth beauty pageant circuit. And I enjoyed that quite a bit. I really enjoy being judged. I believe I hold up very well to even severe scrutiny.

column63: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Yeah?

column65: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Oh; Angela, you were totally satisfactory this year.

column68: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Jan! To what do I owe this pleasure?
column69: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jan: I am returning your many calls.
column70: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Well, hello to you, too. Um, yeah, I was just um, I just wanted to get some closure on uh, what transpired between us at the meeting we had in the parking lot of the Chili's.
column71: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jan: No. No, we won't be discussing that, Michael. The only things I wanna talk about during your performance review are your concrete ideas to improve your branch.
column72: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Well, surely this uh, review is a formality because of what happened uh, at our meeting in the parking lot of Chili's.

column74: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Oh.
column75: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jan: I expect you to forget anything that you think may have happened between us and exhibit completely professional behavior.
column76: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Been thinking about you.
column77: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jan: Ok, that is an example of completely unprofessional behavior.
column78: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Um, I don't see how that's unprofessional. Just-
column79: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jan: Michael.
column80: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Yep.
column81: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jan: Are the cameras with you...
column82: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: No.
column83: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jan: ...in your office?
column84: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: They are not. Yes, they are. [Jan hangs up] That's my girlfriend.
column85: 02x08 - Performance Review;Kevin: I heard they made out and had s*x.
column86: 02x08 - Performance Review;Oscar: No, they just made out. That's it.
column87: 02x08 - Performance Review;Kevin: Well, I heard they made out and had s*x.
column88: 02x08 - Performance Review;Angela: Don't talk about it. Office romances are nobody's business but the people involved.
column89: 02x08 - Performance Review;Kevin: Romances?
column90: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Pam, I have ideas on a daily basis. I know I do. I have a clear memory of telling people my ideas. Um, is there any chance you wrote any of my ideas down? In a folder? A "Michael-idea" folder?
column91: 02x08 - Performance Review;Pam: Sorry.
column92: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: That's unfortunate. How 'bout the suggestion box? There's tons of ideas in there.

column95: 02x08 - Performance Review;Pam: Oh, yeah. Uh, I think I remember that from back from when I first started.
column96: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Why don't you find it and tell people to get theirs... never mind, I'll tell them. Hello, everybody? Yeah, uh, attention, please. Jan Levinson's coming, very soon, and so, we're going to have our weekly suggestion box meeting, so you can all get your constructive compliments in a.s.a.p.
column97: 02x08 - Performance Review;Ryan: Don't you mean constructive criticism?

column99: 02x08 - Performance Review;Kelly: You said "constructive complements"; that doesn't make any sense.

column102: 02x08 - Performance Review;Dwight: Saturday.
column103: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jim: [pumps fist] ...Saturday, so just let me know what you're doing tomorrow, Saturday, for lunch. Ok, talk to you soon.

column107: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jan: I'm good; how are you?
column108: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Good to see you.
column109: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jan: Nice to see you.
column110: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Ok. [tries to kiss Jan's hand] Ok, why don't we just step into my office? We're gonna go in here.

column112: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Yep, right after you. Apres-vous. [mouths to Pam] No calls.

column122: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Alright.
column123: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jan: Period.
column124: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Yep.
column125: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jan: Do we understand each other.
column126: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Absolutely.

But, "Wait, I'm still gonna call you." But, but, "We're just gonna talk business. And I may come down and fire you if you don't do your job." But what were talking about when we first kissed? Business.
column128: 02x08 - Performance Review;
column129: 02x08 - Performance Review;
column130: 02x08 - Performance Review;
column131: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jan: So are you still in the middle of the performance reviews then?
column132: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: No, no, no, I finished all of that. I'm very fast. I'm not too fast. Not like wham-bam-thank ya ma'am. But I do say thank ya ma'am. column156: 02x08 - Performance Review;Pam: Everyone's waiting in the conference room.
column157: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jan: Great. Very good.
column158: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Why are we here? Because I value your opinions. Now, I know a lot of don't think that I read your suggestions, but I do. I just sift through them every week and I really look and scrutinize to see what you guys are writing. Um, so, let's, uh, just read some of these suckers. Alright. Number one[/b]: "What should we do to prepare for Y2K?"
column159: 02x08 - Performance Review;Dwight: What should we do to prepare for Y2K?
column160: 02x08 - Performance Review;Kelly: I thought you read these every week.

column162: 02x08 - Performance Review;Dwight: It happens occasionally.
column163: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: And, um, one down. Next suggestion[/b]: "we need better outreach for employees fighting depression". Ok, alright, enough with the jokes. Nobody in here is suffering from depression.
column164: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jan: That sounds serious, Michael.
column165: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Oh, ok, well, yeah, who wrote it?

column167: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Tom. Then it is a joke because there is nobody in here named Tom.
column168: 02x08 - Performance Review;Phyllis: Tom? He worked in accounting up until about a year ago. [blank stares] Tom? [acts like she's shooting herself in the head] Pow.
column169: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Oh, that guy? That guy was weird. Alright, next suggestion.
column170: 02x08 - Performance Review;Dwight: Next suggestion.

column172: 02x08 - Performance Review;Dwight: You need to do something about your B.O.
column173: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Ok, I don't know who this suggestion is meant for, but it's more of a personal suggestion and it's not an office suggestion. Far be it for me to use this as a platform to embarrass anybody.

column175: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Well, Toby, if by me you are inferring that I have B.O., then I would say that is a very poor choice of words.

column177: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Was I, Creed?! Ok, well, you know what? I am implying is that when we're on an elevator together, I should maybe take the stairs, because talk about stank. Not that I would ever say something like that in public, and I never have, and I never will. I just think it's something that we should all be aware of. Ok? Now that we've learned this, let's continue. See, this is good, we're learning and we're figuring some stuff out. "You need to do something about your coffee breath"-
column178: 02x08 - Performance Review;Dwight: You need-
column179: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Ok.

column181: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Shut up, shut up, shut up, Dwight, OK. I don't think you people are grasping the concept of the suggestion box.

column183: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Yeah, is that hard for you? Alright, well-
column184: 02x08 - Performance Review;Angela: Well, when you have coffee breath-
column185: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: I'll work on that-
column186: 02x08 - Performance Review;Angela: It's hard.
column187: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: Let's keep going. Keep it going. Yep. What do we have here? We have somebody's piece of gum. Somebody put a piece of gum in there. This is not a, a garbage can, this is the future of our company. This is not a place for gum. I don't wanna have to read these tomorrow.
column188: 02x08 - Performance Review;Dwight: Yeah, who wants to come in on a Saturday?

column191: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: "Don't sl-", ok, that's blank [Dwight picks up note] Don't, just put it-

Hiya! The least you can do is keep my salary consistent with inflation! Keeya eyah! Yes! Why are you gonna give me this raise? Why? Because... I'm awesome! I am awesome!
column204: 02x08 - Performance Review;Michael: I just don't understand why you have to pretend like nothing happened.
column205: 02x08 - Performance Review;Jan: Because nothing did, Michael. It, I'm not going to say anything more about it, and I would advise that you do the same
